body.name: Aluan Handheld Fan Powerful Personal Mini Portable Speed Adjustable Battery Operated USB Rechargeable Eyelash Fan for Kids Women Men Indoor Outdoor Travel Cooling, Pink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 25 mins
features: 【Strong Wind】 You will be surprised at how powerful the handheld fan is compared to its small size, the mini fan is inbuilt with the pure copper made brushless motor that can support the fan run at high speed to produce super strong wind, you can feel the breeze even 7ft away from it.

【Lightweight and Portable】This mini handheld fan only measures 15.5* 8.5* 5cm/ 6.1* 3.3* 2in, 68g/ 0.15lb, you can put it into your pocket or bag, hang on your neck with the lanyard when not use and take it with you wherever you go.

【USB Rechargeable】 Powered by upgraded rechargeable battery, which is able to hold charge longer than the same capacity battery, the included usb cable is compatible with any USB port like computer, power bank, wall outlet, car charger, you can charge it everywhere at anytime.

【3 Speed Adjustable】 The small fan can satisfy different cooling needs with its 3 wind speed adjustable features, press the power button for one/ twice/ three times for low/ medium/ high speed, get away from hot flashes and sweat with this super cute fan.

【Wide Application】 This pocket fan can produce powerful natural wind to cool you off quickly and keep you always cool, it's perfect to use when travelling, walking, jogging, waiting in line, doing sports, etc, it also an ideal helper to dry make up spray, I promise this little guy would be your best partner during this hot summer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Handheld Fan with 3 Speeds Adjustable Ideal Gift The pink color looks fresh and more match with summer, you will surely be the envy of everyone with this novel pocket fan, it's ideal both for your own use or as a gift for you friends. Safe to Use Adopt ABS material, toxic free and safe, this portable fan is suitable for everyone including children, please feel free to use it.

Premium Motor, Powerful Wind The portable fan is equipped with a powerful motor and the upgraded battery can support the fan run longer than the same capacity regular battery. USB Type-C Charging Port The mini fan with USB type-c port, fully charged in just 1.5h. Red light will be on when charging, and the light will turn off when fully charged. Small Size, Light Weight The mini handheld fan is easy to hold and space- saving, you can put it into pocket or bag; Hang on your neck when waiting in line and travelling. Package Content 1* Pink handheld fan 1* USB Type-C cable 1* Lanyard 1* User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I keep this in my purse and I honestly have to hide it as anyone near me will be asking me to point it in their direction! it is a pretty powerful fan for its size and the battery is rechargeable and lasts quite a while. I went on a weekend trip in the humidity and did not need to recharge until I arrived back home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so happy i bought this!
reviews.reviewText: it has a flat profile so slips into my bag without being bulky. it is light weight. at the highest fan speed it isn’t noisy. you can feel the breeze with each level and feel the difference. it charged up quickly too. i charged it up when it arrived and tested it. no problem at all. i use it on my bus ride home and even it the highest setting it wasn’t loud or noisy to bother anyone seated close to me. i would have returned it if noisy like a small hair dryer. i really love that the fan handle and the fan face is almost flat instead of big and round like other hand fans sold on amazon. the only thing to be careful not to accidentally touch the on switch when putting in bag or moving things around in your bag. i am extremely happy with my purchase and i love the soft mint green color too! this is a very affordable fan to own for days when the bus ventilation is out of order or when waiting on line where there is very little ventilation. it would be good if there was a way to temporarily attach to back of a cell phone. the handle was long enough that i was able to hold fan and my cell phone and had fan running while i was using the phone to watch video and to send text messages, that’s how flat there can handle is and i have small hands. very good purchase👍👍👍👍👏👏👏👏👏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing for eye lashes but don't get to close to it
reviews.reviewText: This is the best thing there's 3 modes Yea and there good for ur lashes. It's small but has a strong fan. U got to be careful BCS I got my lashes stuck before BCS I got to close but it didn't hurt so da best in the west🏜️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small enough to bring everywhere!
reviews.reviewText: This was one of my best impulse buys ever. I have some funky health issues that make it difficult for my body to regulate heat, and I was worried that I would get heat sick at an outdoor concert in the middle of summer. This thing was a perfect solution - it fit really well in my small purse (but had a large strap so I could put it around my neck), and it actually was very effective! It has since been to baseball games, festivals, and renaissance faires, and I still haven't had to charge it again. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This fan was great for our trip to Disney World and that Florida heat and humidity. Small and compact enough to put in a small purse. Loved the 3 speeds and the battery life was great. Lasted all day. The only negative thing was the stand was not very stable and didn’t like that I had to remove it completely from the fan and re-attach it in order to make the fan stand up. Stand seemed a bit flimsy plastic and I was afraid it would break, so didn’t bother to use the stand part. Aside from that, the fan was good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is my favorite thing in the whole world! I tend to run really hot so I always keep it in my purse. The batter lasts so long and I love that it has different speeds. I’ve taken it on few trips and even got some for family members!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cools well on face and neck.l
reviews.reviewText: I was satisfied with this fan and gave it as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Personal Fan Ever!!!. Couldn't live without mine.
reviews.reviewText: First I must say this is the best item I have purchased all year!! I tend to be warmer than most, including my husband. This fan charges on the same charger I use for my phone. It does come with it's own short charging cord. The amount of air flow is unbelievable. The 3 speeds will meet anyone's needs. See photo:. I roll a small pillow up and lay it against my nightstand.Then I prop the fan on the rolled pillow, lying it on it's side, and turn it on to blow on my head, my body, wherever. The sound is low and soft like a sound machine. I do leave it plugged into the cord (mine) if I use it for any length of time, including overnight. The sound is relaxing.I own a second one for an end table by my chair in the family room. And now I keep a 3rd in my purse for those places you walk into and the heat is set at 80. Lightweight and easy to use. Cool off and treat yourself. You'll wonder how you lived without it!! And the price is low.
